metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000122 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer over-read exists in curl 7.20.0 to and including curl 7.58.0 inthe RTSP+RTP handling code that allows an attacker to cause a denial ofservice or information leakage

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
libcurl3-nss - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
libcurl4 - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.58.0-2ubuntu3').
